[Posit AI](https://posit.ai) is a set of artificial intelligence (AI) features available as a downloadable extension for RStudio. To provide feedback or report bugs, please open a [GitHub Issue on the RStudio repository](https://github.com/rstudio/rstudio/issues).

## Prerequisites

-   To use Posit AI in RStudio, you must have a compatible version of RStudio installed. Posit AI is available for RStudio Desktop or Server 2026.04.0 and later. Posit Workbench disables Posit AI by default, but an administrator can enable it.
-   To use Posit AI, you must have access to the internet in order to send requests to the Posit AI APIs and receive suggestions.

## Setup

::: {.callout-note title="Using Posit AI with Workbench"}
With Workbench, a system administrator must first enable Posit AI. To enable it, add the following line:

```         
allow-posit-assistant=1
```

to `/etc/rstudio/rsession.conf`.
:::

To enable Posit AI in RStudio:

1.  Navigate to **Tools** \> **Global Options** \> **Assistant**.
2.  Select **Posit Assistant** from the **Chat provider** dropdown.
3.  Select **Posit Assistant** from the **Use code assistant** dropdown to use Posit AI for Next-Edit Suggestions (optional).
4.  Click **OK** to close the **Global Options** dialog.
5.  Select **View** \> **Show Posit Assistant** and follow the prompts to install and sign up for Posit AI.

::: {.callout-note title="Posit AI Account Assistance"}
For more information on signing up and managing your Posit AI account visit <https://docs.posit.co/posit-ai>.
:::
